form.official-title: To extend the authority to carry out the Defense Production Act of 1950.

section.header: Extension of Defense Production Act of 1950 authority
section.text: Section 717(a) of the Defense Production Act of 1950 (50 U.S.C. 4564(a)) is amended by striking September 30, 2025 and inserting September 30, 2031.
